DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether woman gestational age 30 week without comorbidities , performance serial 3rd trimester growth ultrasounds increase frequency identify abnormality fetal growth amniotic fluid , compare woman receive indicate ultrasound ?
DOC.brief_title: Determination Abnormal Fetal Growth Amniotic Fluid With Third Trimester Ultrasounds Uncomplicated Pregnancies : A Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: Maternal age 18 time consent Singleton gestation First sonographic examination 20 week Women follow comorbidities : Autoimmune disorder ( antiphospholipid antibody , lupus , rheumatoid arthritis , scleroderma ) , Cerclage index pregnancy , Diabetes mellitusâ€”gestational pregestational , Hematologic disorder ( coagulation defect , sickle cell disease , thrombocytopenia , thrombophilia ) , Hypertension ( chronic pregnancy induce ) enrollment , HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) , Institutionalized individual ( prisoner ) , Prior obstetric history : [ 1 ) intrauterine growth restriction , 2 ) preterm birth 34 week , 3 ) severe preeclampsia ] , eclampsia , HELLP syndrome , 4 ) stillbirth 24 week neonatal death , Preterm labor rupture membrane enrollment , Psychiatric disorder ( bipolar , depression ) medication , Placenta previa / 3rd trimester bleeding , Renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL ) , Restrictive lung disease , Fetal red blood cell isoimmunization , Seizure disorder medication , Thyroid disease medication , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 40 kg/m2 Major fetal Anomaly include : anencephaly , spina bifida , bilateral renal agenesis , cystic hygroma hydrops , diaphragmatic hernia , congenital heart defect Unable understand consent English Spanish
